Posts.Content: Hi: I am a 75 yrs old; healthy. Suggested by Sloan Kettering OM to have dose density and NYU OM to have AC or CMF. I am leaning toward DD. I read your info with interest. Can you clarify how you got through the 4 month program. Would appreciate your response --- Message edited by CancerCompass staff: for personal protection, email address removed. Please review CancerCompass Member Guidelines at http://www.cancercompass.com/common/guidelines.html --- thank you and continued good health. Shirley
Posts.Title: Chemo Treatments

Posts.Content: Hi Marlene: I just read your message. Did you indeed have a Vit C drip right after your surgery. I am about to have chemo and I am holistic. Did you have chemo and Vit C drips. My email is --- Message edited by CancerCompass staff: for personal protection, email address removed. Please review CancerCompass Member Guidelines at http://www.cancercompass.com/common/guidelines.html --- Thank you. Shirley
Posts.Title: Help For my Mother

Posts.Content: In 2005 I had bilateral bc which included left breast with lympth node involvement and right breast with very small cancer site.  Had only chemo because I came down with diabetic neuropathy.  Too sick to have radiation.  This year came down with very small new cancer site in right breast.  Had three lumpectomies.  Am going to have radiation on new site.  Can anyone relate to multiple bc sites?  I am 77 years.Thanks!  shana
Posts.Title: Bilateral BC - 3 new cancer sites

Posts.Content: Hi: I am 75 yrs. old in the New York City area with stage 2; considered healthy by doctors. It was suggested by a medical oncologist to have dose dense chemo and another medical oncologist to have ac or cmf. I am trying to make a decision at this time. Would appreciate those women over 60+ who are contemplating having dose dense chemo or have had it to write to me. Am interested in how you fared during that experience, how you handled side effects and if you are finished how do you feel now. Looking forward to hearing from you. Thank you. Shirley
Posts.Title: Dose Dense For Women in Their 60s+

Posts.Content: Hi, I'm a 75 year old woman living in NY recently diagnosed with Stage II Breast Cancer. I had a lumpectomy and chemo, likely dense will start shortly. Is acupuncture effective against nausea? Thanks, Shirley
Posts.Title: Nausea
